headline: Show HN: AI powered food ingredient analysis for healthier shopping
description:
Itsmyfood is a Calorie Counter App that encourages healthy eating with Food Additive Library for healthy grocery shopping and a meal planner to make healthy meal plans.

Users can access the AI-powered food ingredient analysis by simply scanning a barcode.

available at

https://apps.apple.com/app/id1604091383

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.shaping.itsmyfood
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 用AI驱动的食品成分分析实现更健康的购物
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 用AI驅動的食品成分分析實現更健康的購物
description_zh-Hans:
Itsmyfood是一款鼓励健康饮食的卡路里计数器应用程序，其食品添加剂库用于健康杂货采购，膳食计划器用于制定健康膳食计划。

用户只需扫描条形码即可获得由人工智能驱动的食品成分分析。

可在

https://apps.apple.com/app/id1604091383

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.shaping.itsmyfood。
description_zh-Hant:
Itsmyfood是一款鼓勵健康飲食的卡路里計數器應用程序，其食品添加劑庫用於健康雜貨採購，膳食計劃器用於制定健康膳食計劃。

用戶只需掃描條形碼即可獲得由人工智能驅動的食品成分分析。

可在

https://apps.apple.com/app/id1604091383

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.shaping.itsmyfood。
